## InlineSvgConfig type

global options for configuring behaviors of the inline-svg preprocessor

**Signature:**

```typescript
type InlineSvgConfig = {
    inlineSrcAttributeName?: string;
    keepInlineSrcAttribute?: boolean;
};
```
